LanguageData.RV2R_PetJoined: {0}, having become {1}'s vore pet, has decided to join your colony.
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_SizedEncumberance_Tip: Enable to scale encumberance by total weight of all prey. Disable to scale encumberance by count of prey, Can cause problems for smaller preds.
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_EncumberanceModifier_Tip: How heavy prey are. Setting too high can easily incapacitate preds. Prey held in extremiedies or absorbed in some way are easier to hold.
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_EncumberanceVisible_Tip: Makes the "weighed down" hediff used for encumbrance visible. This dosn't change it's functonality, it just makes it visible to the player./n/nNote that it will always be shown when hovering over a pawn's moving capacity stat if it is affecting it.
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_EncumberanceCap_Tip:
How high the "Weighed Down" hediff is allowed to get to. Can be used to quickly get overburdedened preds back up to let some prey out. One prey, assuming no modifiers and same size, is 25%.

At 25%, moving reduction is -17.5%.
At 50%, it's -40%.
At 75%, it's -65%.
At 100%, it's -150%.
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_EncumberanceTurnOff: Due to how the encumbrance scaling works, disabling size-based encumbrance scaling will not revert to RimVore-2's methods for encumbrance, instead using a method that aproximates it. To revert, set encumbrance multiplier to 0% and remove Patches/Patch_Hediffs_Vore_CapmodRemoval.xml from this submod's Common folder.
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_EndoSickness_Tip: How quickly (if at all) a pawn should get "endo sick" while safely inside of a pred. At default, it's 1% severity per "vore tick". It's not dangerous, and even puts them in a good mood, at the cost of being loopy and disorientated for about a day or two.\n\nIndirectly nerfs endo storage as a way to keep medics and such safe and makes struggling harder, among other things.
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_EndoSicknessPacification_T: Prey that are too endo sick can no longer struggle, and will be captured if hostile.
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_AgeRegression_Tip: How quickly, in days spent to days gained, prey regress in age while unbirthed. They'll never regress to below biological adulthood, which varies by race. Set to 0 to disable, and to 1 to prevent but not reverse aging.\n\n(Remember that Rimworld has 60 days in a year.)
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_AgeRegressionCure_Tip: Age-regressed prey have a small chance to be cured of chronic illnesses while unbirthed. Odds increase the younger they get.
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_Pets_Tip: Predators and prey who willingly spend this many days straight in a vore stage gain a special relationship, providing a permanate opinion boost. Can be abused, but pets and their preds will get upset if something happens to the other. Pets can only have one pred, but preds can have multiple pets.
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_PetRecruitment_Tip: Prey will join your faction if they become a pet of one of your pawns. Can very easily be abused.
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_EndoThoughts_Tip: Lets preds and prey gain positive thoughts if they're in a relationship or bonded, based on their opinion of each other.n\n\At most, it's +5 mood for spouses, +5 mood for holding 2 bonded animals, and +5 mood for belly pets.
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_EndoCapture_Tip: Enabled, hostiles are captured and imprisoned if endo-vored by a colonist or colony animal while downed. Works great with heal-voring incapacitated raiders, and enabling means predatory trained animals have a way to help with recruitment.\n\n(Animals trained in predation will heal-vore hostiles if they can't fatal vore them.)
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_EndoCapture_Insectoids_Tip: Members of the Sorne Geneline are pacified if endo-captured, ready to be tamed when released. Not at all balanced.
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_EndoCapture_Scaria_Tip: Healing vore can cure scaria, allowing endo-capture to be used on rabid animals. They'll only capture or endo-rescue animals you've set to tame.
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_EndoCapture_Recruitment_Ti: Prisoners set to "Reduce Resistance" or "Recruit" will have their resistance slowly lower while willingly endo-vored. Having a warden chat them up is still faster, and this won't sway the unwavering.
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_AnimalRandomNomChance_Tip: How often, in hours on average, an animal trained to be playfully predatory will endo vore others. They're request vore to colonists, but they'll just nom anything else.
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_AnimalRandomNomChanceModif: The percentage of average hours to add for each prey a playful predator has. At default, 1 prey increases the average hours from 24 to 30, and two increases it to 36.
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_AnimalRandomNomFatal_Tip: ...You, uh, might want to leave this off.
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_EndoBondChance_Tip: When an animal and a humanoid are engaged in endo vore, they have a chance to form a bond every vore tick. Wild animals can end up bonded too, so keep that in mind when you take that wolf home with you.\n\nYou really should keep this low.
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_EndoBondPredOnly_Tip: Normaly, endo bonds happen only when the pred is humanoid. Enabling means humanoid pawns can bond while endo prey for an animal.\n\nYou might wanna leave this off.
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_EndoBondUnwilling_Tip: Normaly, endo bonds happen only when the prey is willing. But who's to say that fox isn't the submissive type?
LanguageData.RV2R_Settings_VornyBonds_Tip: Bonded animals are more likely to pick their bond as an play-vore target, and bonds always agree to vore proposals.
LanguageData.RV2R_Cheats_NoBleedOut_Tip: Caps a prey's Blood loss hediff to 90%. Dramaticaly lowers fatalies when using healing vore.
LanguageData.RV2R_Cheats_StopBleeding_Tip: Prey have their bleeding gradualy lower while vored. Does not tend injuries, just reduces bleeding.
LanguageData.RV2R_Cheats_NoExtremeTemp_Tip: Caps a prey's hypothermia and heat stroke hediffs to 30%.
LanguageData.RV2R_Cheats_HyperHealing_Tip: Healing preds start casting curaga instead of cure, dramaticaly improving the best vore goal. Having a skilled doctor tend injuries and then heal-vore is still more effective.
LanguageData.RV2R_FuckUnity:
Remember to add

0.0.0.0 *unity.com
0.0.0.0 *.unity.com
0.0.0.0 *unity3d.com
0.0.0.0 *.unity3d.com

 to your hosts file. You'll gain a sense of pride and accomplishment, no surprise mechanics needed.


RimWorld was created with Unity, which has decided to fuck over every single developer who has ever used their platform. Show some love to Ludeon Studios and other once-Unity devs.


Fuck Unity.
